org.osmdroid.google.wrapper

Class MapController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.osmdroid.google.wrapper.MapController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMapController

    public class MapController
extends Object
implements IMapController
    A wrapper for the Google MapController class. This implements IMapController, which is also implemented by the osmdroid MapController.
    Author:
    Neil Boyd
